Player History
Drafted in 14th round, 209th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Kevin Kunio (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/20/2015, off Michael Strother (PHI)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 3/11/2016 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/3/2017 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Injured on 4/20/2017 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 6/13/2017 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Seattle to New York on 3/2/2018 (Going to SEA: P Jordan Goss. Going to NY: SS Steve Schlesinger)...
Traded from New York to Chicago on 4/16/2019 (Going to CHI: SS Steve Schlesinger, P James Jenny, 1B Kasey Cuthbert. Going to NY: SS Manuel Bejarano)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Houston on 7/25/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2019, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/4/2020 to a 4-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2020, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/3/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $3,300,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2024, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
